headline: Here’s Why The Clorox Company (CLX) Recovery Story is Gaining Momentum
summary: JB Global Capital, an investment firm, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. During Q4 2025, JB Global Capital reported an 8.9% decline, largely driven by a sharp drop in Alibaba, its largest holding, while global markets posted modest gains. Despite the quarter’s setback, the fund delivered […]

headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Avoid
summary: Stability is great, but low-volatility stocks may struggle to deliver market-beating returns over time as they sometimes underperform during bull markets.
